edu.uci.ics.luci.lucicabinet
Class BDB_LUCI_Remote

java.lang.Object
  edu.uci.ics.luci.lucicabinet.DB_LUCI
      edu.uci.ics.luci.lucicabinet.DB_LUCI_Remote
          edu.uci.ics.luci.lucicabinet.BDB_LUCI_Remote

public class BDB_LUCI_Remote
extends DB_LUCI_Remote

This is a convenience class for specifying that the remote database is a tokyo cabinet B-Tree Database. This interface can't enforce that the remote implementation is actually BDB, however.

Constructor Detail

BDB_LUCI_Remote

public BDB_LUCI_Remote(java.lang.String host,
                       java.lang.Integer port)
                throws java.net.UnknownHostException,
                       java.io.IOException
This method opens a socket connection and read/write stream to a remote server running a Butler service.

Parameters:
host - The remote host to connect to, e.g. "localhost", "192.128.1.20"
port - The port that the remote host is listening on.
Throws:
java.net.UnknownHostException
java.io.IOException - thrown if the remote host doesn't respond with the expected handshake.
